channel.title: Notable Artists Born Today
channel.description: RSS feed of notable writers, poets, directors, and actors born on this day in history.

item.title: Christopher Mayer (American actor)
item.description: Christopher Mayer (born George Charles Mayer III; February 21, 1954 â€“ July 23, 2011), also known as Chip Mayer, was an American actor. He was best known for portraying Vance Duke on The Dukes of Hazzard for 19 episodes during season 5 when cousins Coy and Vance Duke temporarily replaced Bo and Luke Duke (due to a salary dispute between producers and the original actors).

item.title: Andrew Wilson (actor)
item.description: Andrew Cunningham Wilson (born August 22, 1964) is an American actor and director. He is the older brother of actors Owen Wilson and Luke Wilson.
